transcription: He is torturing him so much, he is not opening his mouth. If we do a Narcoanalysis test, he will not only open his mouth, but also his brain.  Srisailam sir, what do you do? I am a college bus driver. Which college? CMR Engineering College. Srisailam sir, where are you from? Which is your village?  Pakistan? No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No.  Who sent him? He is a terrorist leader from Pakistan. Why does he have to kill me? Peace talks. Peace talks? Tell me. If it is a success. If it is a success?  What is your name? What is Sri? Tell me. What is the name of the fort? What do you do? What is Me? Tell me. Find out which regiment it is. Tell me.  Watch me.  I
